content.query:
SELECT
    Carrier,
    COUNT(CAST(DepDelay AS INT)) AS Delay,
    SUM(CAST(DepDel15 AS INT)) AS Delay15

FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://hallinc@hallincdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/flights/parquet/Year=*/Month=*/DayofMonth=*/*.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) AS flights
WHERE 
    flights.filepath(1) = '2013' AND 
    flights.filepath(2) = '5' AND
    flights.filepath(3) = '19'
GROUP BY Carrier
;
